mapper.sql: noticeNo, managerID as userID, noticeTitle, noticeBody, noticeDate, noticeHit, noticeFile
mapper.select:
SELECT noticeNo, managerID as userID, noticeTitle, noticeBody, noticeDate
FROM notice ORDER BY noticeNo DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT noticeNo, managerID as userID, noticeTitle, noticeBody, noticeDate, noticeHit, noticeFile
FROM notice WHERE 1=1
AND noticeBody like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR managerID like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR noticeTitle like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND noticeBody like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND managerID like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND noticeTitle like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
LIMIT #{start},#{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE 1=1
AND noticeBody like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR managerID like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR noticeTitle like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND noticeBody like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND managerID like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND noticeTitle like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
SELECT noticeNo, managerID as userID, noticeTitle, noticeBody, noticeDate, noticeHit, noticeFile FROM notice order by noticeNo desc limit 0,10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (managerID, noticeTitle, noticeBody, noticeDate, noticeFile) VALUES (#{userID}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeBody}, now(), #{noticeFile})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeNo, managerID as userID, noticeTitle, noticeBody, noticeDate, noticeHit, noticeFile FROM notice WHERE noticeNo = #{noticeNo}
